personalInfo.name: Kelvin Githu
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full-Stack Developer specializing in SAP Business One integrations, Vue.js frontend development, and enterprise-level applications. Proven track record delivering scalable solutions with expertise in Laravel, React Native, and API integrations.

experience.description: Leading development of enterprise SAP Business One integrations and modern web applications
achievements: Implemented automated Purchase Order inventory control system preventing inventory overflow
Developed 6 major SAP B1 frontend modules using Vue.js 3
Created comprehensive Blanket Agreements system with 11 RESTful API endpoints
Streamlined procurement and inventory management processes

projects.name: SAP B1 Purchase Order Inventory Control System
projects.description: Automated validation system that blocks Purchase Orders when inventory would exceed predefined maximum levels
features: Custom field U_MaxInvLevel in Item Master Data table
User-specific override capabilities for procurement managers
projects.impact: Prevented inventory overflow and optimized stock management organization-wide

projects.name: Partsultan Automotive Parts Sourcing Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive B2B platform for automotive parts sourcing with intelligent supplier management
features: WhatsApp Business API integration with template approval management
AI-powered response analysis with quality scoring
Smart message formatting handling API restrictions
Laravel Queue system for background processing
projects.impact: Reduced sourcing time from hours to minutes, improved supplier response rates

projects.name: ICABS Transportation Platform
projects.description: Full-featured taxi/ride-sharing application with real-time capabilities
features: Firebase Realtime Database and Firestore integration
Comprehensive security rules for data protection
projects.impact: Complete transportation solution with modern UI/UX and WCAG AA compliance

projects.name: SAP B1 Frontend Modules
projects.description: Comprehensive frontend interfaces for six major SAP Business One modules
features: Responsive design for desktop and tablet
projects.impact: Streamlined SAP operations across multiple departments

projects.name: Climate Vulnerability Mapping Application
projects.description: Interactive data visualization platform for climate vulnerability analysis across African countries
features: CSV to SQLite migration for performance
projects.impact: Enabled data-driven climate policy decisions for African regions

projects.name: Blanket Agreements Implementation
projects.description: Complete blanket agreement management system for procurement
projects.impact: Streamlined procurement process and improved vendor management

projects.name: HyddroHarvest Website
projects.description: Modern static site for water harvesting solutions company
projects.impact: Professional web presence with optimal performance

projects.name: Conference Management Platform
projects.description: Full-stack web application for international AI/ML conference organization featuring public event information and application management
features: Public-facing event information and news system
Application submission and review workflow for 200+ applicants
Admin panel for content management and application evaluation
Gallery system with downloadable media from multiple years
Speaker showcase with interactive UI components
projects.impact: Architected complete Next.js 14 application with PostgreSQL database schema (7+ tables), secure admin authentication, and responsive UI supporting mobile and desktop users

education.degree: Bachelor's in Communication and Computer Networks
